runs.comm: 156 kph! Take that! Short outside off and he slashes at it, beaten for pace
159 kph! The gun's not kidding, this one skids through and hits his pads before he can blink
160.7 kph! Phew, full outside off and Farhat reaches out to drive and he misses
150 kph, down the leg side and Farhat tries to run it down to fine leg and he misses
157 kph, that's a half volley outside off and he squeezes it past the covers, the ball slows down before the rope
155 kph, he;s onto the shot too early,mistimes the pull
147.1 kph, bowls it on a good length outside off, leaves it to the keeper
this one rears up on him and he manages to get his arms high to fend it off
149 kph, full and wide outside off, Nazir goes for a desperate slash and misses
that's a short one, fizzer really, I don't think they're able to see the ball well enough, pulls and misses

first blood to Australia in the chase! Nazir taps it down towards short extra cover and sets off, risks the single to Johnson who has a powerful arm, he fires it at the base of the stumps and Nazir is just short, third umpire takes a look
149 kph, digs out a yorker and he leaps up and deflects it to the on side
152 kph,
this one fizzes past the outside edge, holds its line outside the off stump
fires it full on the off stump, he gets to the pitch of the ball and crashes it past mid-off and cover
beats him for pace outside the off stump, he tries to cut through the off side but gets a thick outside edge snapped up by Watson at second slip, poor choice of shot, he should have left it
150.6 kph, hits it short of a length and the ball fizzes past the outside edge
gets beside the line and steers him to the off side
short of a length and steered toward backward point
short ball and in a flash he pulls it over the in field, the ball drops safe of any catchers and just sort of stops there
punches this one into the off side
clears his leg and biffs the ball nicely over mid-on, just picked the length and dumped it over the fielder for four
this time he slashes over the off side, just wide of a leaping cover fielder, Warner jumps up and cannot get to it
better length and better footwork from Akmal, who punches the ball into the gap at cover and runs hard but ends up slowing down when he sees the ball win that race
tries to unsettle Latif with bounce and pace - 158ks - but he smacks it over square leg
short on the body and he jumps up and taps it to midwicket
continues swinging, lashing a short ball from outside off stump and miscuing it over mid-on, the ball drops safely and Akmal survives
another swing and again he goes over wide mid-on, he's just swinging freely
bowls a yorker but its wide of off stump, Akmal backs away and misses and a wide is called
pitches on a length and Akmal punches a lovely flowing shot over mid-on's head
fuller ball on about middle and off stump and he again unfurls a lovely punchy drive, high and high and over the ropes down the ground, that is a straight six
pitches it up and Latif pushes off the front foot to extra cover
wafts at a short ball that sits up nicely and cannot connect

gets his man with the incutter! Pitches length, a slower ball it seems, and cuts back off the track to hit Latif on the flap as he shapes to work it away, looks to the naked eye as its headed into leg stump and so the umpire agrees ... but, but, but replays show a thin inside edge so Latif is unlucky, a bad call from Paul Reifel sends him on his way
short of a length and he gets back to defend
fuller ball, he drives down the track and Watson fields well
short down leg stump, he jumps up and tucks it to fine leg
fuller ball, lovely push off the front foot, but Smith at mid-off intercepts to save four, well stopped lad
fuller even, and again he drives, this time a forceful drive that cannot beat cover
short ball, 144ks, tucks him up but he does well to ride with the bounce and drop the ball in front of cover, and sets off for the run, that is well done
gets some good bounce and beats the bat this time
short of a length, he gets up and angles the bat for the cut but cannot time it well and cover fields
leans into the ball and drives all along the carpet to extra cover where Johnson runs across and fields
fuller ball just outside off and Akmal square-drives with power
slaps a short and wide ball over cover and the sweeper fields
slammed! Super shot from Akmal, spotting the short ball and walloping it over midwicket
bad bowling, short and wide and Akmal frees the arms, just using the pace to slap that behind backward point, in the air but who cares because third man is far
change of pace, he dabs the ball and gets send back
full ball well down the pads, gets a bit of boot on the flick
on a length, 152ks, and on-driven down to wide mid-on
pitches it up, 156ks, Malik drives a good-looking shot straight to mid-off
good catch and its 4 for 59! Tait aims for the yorker but serves up a low full toss on Malik's toes, and what does he do? He chips it in the air straight to Birt at midwicket
on-drives the ball off his pads to the midwicket area
151.7ks, short outside off, he flashes and gets beat by the bounce
goes to pull again and gets struck in the underarm, he was into the shot too early, the ball was short and there to be put away
back of a length on the stumps and he defends
too fine and he tucks it down off the pads for two, sprinting really hard and gets back just in time
good ball, short of a length on the stumps and he hops back to defend
angles across at pace, 151ks, and height and beats the bat as Umar hops up and flirts outside off stump
tossed up on a length, gets some turn, Kamran clears the leg and slashes hard, mistiming the shot over cover but it lands safely in the deep
the wrong un, to which Akmal goes back and punches to midwicket
fuller ball, gets some drift, punched straight to extra cover
too straight and Umar gets this one away to short fine leg
too wide and Kamran slashes the ball over cover for four
tossed up, loopy delivery down leg stump and he paddles it away
good length on leg stump, straightens, and Umar defends it back
good length ball, angles away, Umar pokes at it and edges down into the ground wide of slip, who dives to his right and takes pace off the ball
short ball this time into the ribs, he gets over it and turns it to midwicket
short again, stays low, he swivels and drags it down to short fine
uses his crease and dabs the ball in front of cover, it was a tad wide
hello, dolly! That is six! Nannes goes short, Kamran reaches out and clubs that ever so forcefully over wide midwicket for maximum to raise his half-century
spins away from a length, he goes back and cuts to backward point, there's some hesitation between the brothers and they end up running
fuller ball, pushed off the front foot to cover
shot man! Kamran uses his feet, makes room, and drills the ball between two men in the covers, superb placement
too short and he rocks back in a flash to pull it through midwicket
tossed up, pitches middle and leg, he shuffles and drives past midwicket
gets over this one and cuts from off stump towards point
pitched up, he pushes it back in the air just over a leaping Watson, just chipped the slower ball in the air and the bowler just could not get to it
good running! Umar dabs the ball gently wide of backward point, sets off, and comes back for the second
turns this one across the stumps and finds the gap at square leg
length ball, dabbed to backward point
hits a length, lures him forward again, and he angles it to third man
dropped by Johnson at deep square leg! Kamran just picks the ball up off his pads over the infield, Johnson runs in and gets onto his knees to take a regulation catch but the ball pops out
gone this time and he shakes his head! Kamran takes on Tait with a small shimmy and drills the ball to Hussey at mid-on, just failing to get the desired elevation
short of a length, 152ks, and Fawad tucks it back to Tait
150ks, again short of a length and cramping Fawad, who slices it to point
slower ball, just 127ks, on the pads and pushed back to Tait
on a length, bringing him forward, and he pushes to point
hurled down at 150.6ks, not nearly the yorker he wanted, and Umar opens the face and jams the ball down to third man for a single
goes for the big sweep and top-edges over midwicket, ball lands safely
makes room and dances out, drilling the ball past extra cover

edged and taken at slip, a maiden international wicket for Smith! The decision from Clarke to plug a slip works a charm, as Fawad pushes at a nice delivery tossed up just outside off and pokes a straightforward catch into White's lap
flatter one, he gets in line and pushes to the off
gets off the mark with a nudge into the spaces
slower, drifting into leg stump, Umar clips it nicely past midwicket
ouch! Rana is undone by the short ball that sits up and smacks him in the grill as he takes his eyes off it and wafts loosely, but he shoos away attention in a flash
pushes at one short of a length and steers to slip
gets some room and dabs the ball to Clarke at backward point
hits a length, Rana pushes off the front foot to cover
goes full and beats the bat as Rana flashes a drive off the front foot
excellent over from Johnson, and the third maiden of the innings! Short of a length, Rana dabs the ball again straight to the captain at backward point
tossed up, uses his feet and drives down to long-on for one
stumped by a yard! Smith tossed it up on a length, gets a wee bit of turn, Rana dances down the track and swings, missing by a year, and Haddin does the rest
oh hello, whats this? First ball, and Umar tees off for six over wide long-on, just getting under the loopy delivery and giving it all he's got, amazing shot that
flatter, shorter ball, and he gets back and punches to cover
fuller ball drifting into the pads, clipped out to the deep for one
the wrong un, just short of a length, Gul goes back and punches to cover
short ball, pitches outside leg and dashes across, Gul takes his eyes off it and ducks into it
another short ball, 146ks, Gul sways back as it sails over
144ks, short outside off, Gul swings and connects with air

ah, close to a catch! Gul clears his leg and throws the bat on the ball, getting a thick outer edge that flies down toward third man where Tait runs in and slides to his knees but the ball just does not carry
another swing and a miss as Gul heaves at a short ball

bowled and listen to the crowd go wild! Gul walks right across the sticks to about a sixth stump and looks to play some short of bizarre shot to fine leg, but is nowhere near the fuller, straighter ball

he's out, would you believe he is out! Umar clears his front leg to get some elevation and slogs across the line to a length ball, picking out Warner running in from wide long-on who takes a low catch and throws his arms up in celebration
slogs at one short of a length and gets some bat on ball, scampering down as Watson and midwicket run to field
short of a length again, angling across Asif who pokes and runs it down to third man
swing and a miss! Watson goes for a short ball into Ajmal who heaves and cannot make contact
makes room and charges out to a short ball, which slams into his helmet and runs wide of backward point, they just get one to that means Asif needs six to tie

well he gets four but that is not enough! Asif backs away and flat-bats a short ball over mid-on four four but Australia win a thriller to sweep the Tests, ODIs, and Twenty20 of what has been a pretty one-sided series, congratulations to them
